text: <@U02618EV1>: i'm going to send this video to the client. can you help me understand exactly what i'm looking at in this video?
thanks for finding wifi!

<@U02618EV1> my video removed the 660 minimum window height. The issue is that if you load the site with a shorter window, no images appear. I'm taking a look at the code, so please don't sweat it if you can't find WiFi. They can wait.
Got it and I think I know the fix. I should have some free time with wifi in the afternoon and will take a stab a this.
So sorry I missed this when we launched.
Thanks, but don't put off plans or work on vacation
also: don't sweat missing it - its not something anyone even thought of looking at
cause why would you use this site in a small window ever
:grinning:
Fixed the bug but need to find WIFI to push the code.
holy hell
that's awesome
Will ride a wild goat to closest internet station to push this ASAP.

[Swooshipedia frontend/] 2 new commits:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/17c37e2bd5ede5c5a14ecdc289c674030134dd36|17c37e2bd5ed>: Making sure we show the home grid whe the window height is below 660.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/67b1649777697c0c98d42db3386c4d4bc2a00b7d|67b164977769>: Gave the home nav a more user-friendly width when loading on window widths below 768.
 - Gaston Figueroa
OK, code pushed.
:thumbsup:
Seems to be working on my browsers but can you give it a quick test and let me know if anything is broken?
I'm not seeing the issue on safari
Cool
i'll check chrome & ff
chrome :thumbsup:
firefox :thumbsup:
thanks <@U02618EV1>!
Sure thing. We had very a similar bug affecting the nav when loading from a narrow width so I went ahead and fixed that too.
awesome!
